benchmark_details.name: DABench
benchmark_details.overview: DABench is a comprehensive dataset encompassing an extensive range of T2I APIs from the community, specifically designed for text-to-image generation API calling.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a large instruction-following dataset for text-to-image API calling that enhances the alignment of T2I API outputs with user prompts.

data.source: Data collected from the Civitai community, a platform for T2I innovation.
data.annotation: Data was filtered and reconstructed to ensure high quality and relevancy.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated using various scoring models that evaluate the correlation between user prompts and generated images.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better alignment with human preferences and relevancy to the prompts.
methodology.baseline_results: DiffAgent significantly outperformed baseline models in multiple settings, achieving improvements up to 40%.
methodology.validation: Performance evaluated through comprehensive experiments on various datasets and user studies.
